column4: News;Phnom Penh:------  At 7:10 pm on the 28th of January 2019
column5: two males and two females were detained at a massage parlor on Street 371 in Moul Village
column6: Dangkor District by anti-human trafficking police.------The operation was coordinated by Mrs. Srey Vanny
column7: Deputy Chief of Staff of the Phnom Penh Court of First Instance. .------Prior to the raid
column8: she received a complaint filed by the mother of a girl working in a massage parlor at the age of 17
column9: where she had sex with clients .------To crack down on the sexual abuse case
column10: police have taken the two males and two females to the Office of Counter-Trafficking and Minor Protection  for further proceedings.------ ------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/287570
